page.title: 14TOURISM AROUND ILMINGTON
page.content: Ilmington is a village located at the foot of the{Cotswolds}.It has many country lane walks with names such as Tickle Belly Alley,Frog Lane and Dark Lane.Ilmington has a beautiful{Norman} church with a{Norman}tower.A craftsman who was called{Thompson}carved mice into the pews which he crafted in the church as his trademark.Ilmington has two pubs and if you sit outside the {Howard Arms}you may be lucky enough to see the{Morris Men}or the{huntsmen and {beagles}meet.Around the village you may also see Mr.Vincent making{hurdles .On some Sundays the{Manor gardens}and other gardens are open and cream teas are served.Within a short distance of Ilmington are some famous landmarks and places of interest:Warwick Castle,Blenheim Palace,Banbury, Coughton Court and Stratford-on-Avon.
